ul.li: Layer states, such as on, frozen, locked, plot and freeze automatically in a new viewport.
Layer properties, such as color, linetype, lineweight and plot style.

conbody.p: You can save layer settings alternatively. For example, you can choose to save only Frozen/Thawed settings of the layers in a drawing, ignoring all other settings. When you restore the layer states, all settings remain as they are currently set except whether each layer is frozen or thawed.
You can export named layer states to a LAS file for use in other drawings using the Layer States Manager. The layer states of xref cannot be exported.
